content: MT-C-PS OC Pipe stanchion Pipe stanchion for connecting pipe saddles to the top of a vertical girder ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Simpler installation – full vertical adjustability from the end of the vertical girder Easier to transport – lower weight compared to previous versions More economical – new design helps to reduce your total cost of installation Applications Fastening single pipe saddles to the top of a vertical girder Suitable for outdoor environments with low to moderate pollution (C3) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2343198 - Connector MT-C-PS 1-1/4 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2343197 - Connector MT-C-PS 7/8 OC - Package Size 10 pc - 2343196 - Connector MT-C-PS 5/8 OC - Package Size 10 pc
